thoughts: Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} finished {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/} battle training
Tries to imitate the battle moves of other Dark Forest cats
Wonders if it is {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/} fault or {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor's fault that they ended up here
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could put their hunting training to use
Misses the elders' stories
Regrets ever disrespecting {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/} mentor
Tries to convince another Dark Forest cat to train {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Misses eating fresh-kill and sharing tongues with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates
Stands by the StarClan border, hoping a cat will take pity on {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Furiously grabs onto a branch so hard one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws snaps off
Wonders what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did wrong
Tries to groom {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} matted fur only to realize it's too caked with mud to clean
Gives {PRONOUN/m_c/self} a warrior name, but there's no cat around to hear {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Fails a battle move and falls face-first into muck
Wonders if there's truly no prey in the Place of No Stars or if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} just never got enough hunting practice
Misses taking care of the elders and hearing their stories
Is trying to find moss to make a nest for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}, but only finds thorns
Is sleeping in a puddle of muck
Makes a stylish crown of thorns to show off
Is satisfied knowing {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} stuck to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} true self no matter what
Creates complicated new moves that are beautiful and deadly
Tries to groom the muck out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fur
Heckles StarClan cats from the border
Loudly claims that StarClan cats are boring and lame
Wants to tell r_c {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/look/looks} stupid
Mocks a StarClan cat's message theatrically
Reenacts {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death dramatically
Doesn't think {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could have learned more
Decides to create a warrior name for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}
Knows {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} shouldn't call attention to {PRONOUN/m_c/self} but craves it
Is enjoying showing off battle moves for others
